Templates.Template: let $country := display:gen-name-for('Countries', $form/Address/Country, 'en') return <XAL Mode="{ $mode }"> <XALAction Type="create" Entity="region" Key="{ $id }"> <Region> <Id>{ $id }</Id> <Acronym>{ $form/Acronym/text() }</Acronym> <Label>{ $form/Acronym/text() }::{ $country }</Label> <LongLabel>{ $form/Acronym/text() }::{ $country } ({ $form/Region/text() })</LongLabel> <Region>{ $form/Region/text() }</Region> <NutsCodes>{ $form/NutsCodes/* }</NutsCodes> <Address>{ $form/Address/* }</Address> <WebSite>{ $form/WebSite/text() }</WebSite> </Region> </XALAction> </XAL>

<XAL _Prune="none"> <XALAction Type="replace"> <Acronym>{ $form/Acronym/text() }</Acronym> </XALAction> <XALAction Type="replace"> <Label>{ $form/Label/text() }</Label> </XALAction> <XALAction Type="replace"> <LongLabel>{ $form/LongLabel/text() }</LongLabel> </XALAction> <XALAction Type="replace"> <NutsCodes>{ $form/NutsCodes/* }</NutsCodes> </XALAction> { if (empty($subject/Address/Country)) then <XALAction Type="insert" Pivot="$subject/Address"> <Country>{ $form/Country/text() }</Country> </XALAction> else () } <XALAction Type="replace"> <Region>{ $form/Region/text() }</Region> </XALAction> </XAL>

<XAL Mode="{ $mode }"> <XALAction Type="create" Entity="region" Db-uri="/db/sites/cctracker" Key="{ $form/Id/text() }"> <Region> { $form/*[local-name(.) ne 'Country'] } <Address> { $form/Country } </Address> </Region> </XALAction> </XAL>
